ranked_diseases.explanation: This condition directly corresponds to all observed phenotypic features (cleft palate, intellectual disability, global developmental delay) based on similar reference cases, suggesting a strong likelihood of this diagnosis.
This syndrome can present with cleft palate and intellectual disability and may include developmental delays, making it a relevant consideration.
This syndrome is associated with cleft palate and developmental delays, but it does not commonly feature intellectual disability, making it a less likely candidate.
Though this condition can present with cleft lip and palate, intellectual disability, and other developmental issues, it is a broader syndrome with additional features not outlined in this case.
